Header.title: Welcome to Fitness Tracker
Header.paragraph: Track your workouts, set fitness goals, and monitor your progress with personalized plans and nutrition tracking. Start your fitness journey today!

About.paragraph: Fitness Tracker helps you stay on top of your fitness goals with personalized workout plans, nutrition tracking, and progress monitoring. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced athlete, our platform is designed to support your journey toward a healthier lifestyle.
